events.text: The strange bread that always drags you in.
[color=#ffed29](There’s Rondeau, but that’s not Blight...maybe they got a new worker!)
[color=#ffed29](…wait, this seems like a serious conversation…)

Look, Tangeau, I don’t mean to make you mad.
I’m just worried. I just care.
You’re worried?
You don’t even know.

I know you’re upset, Tangeau…  
…I know you’ve been really upset.
[color=#ffed29](Oh, man, this is a lot.)
[color=#ffed29](Maybe I’ll just go home.)
How can you just have him just hanging there...
Because I love seeing his smile.
He wasn’t smiling…
[color=#ffed29](Whoops! I’ve been spotted snooping!)
Hey, uh, Rondeau. Sorry about that.
My friend, Orven!
How long have you known this “friend” for?
Since yesterday!
I gave him a ride home and we talked about our loved ones that had passed.
Uncle, I’ve told you to keep quiet about that.
It’s still open.
I know…Sorry, Tangeau.
Since he’s not here for people to meet…I just want everyone to meet him.
No one ever regretted hearing about or meeting Bongeau.
And Orven told me about his Grandpa who passed!
It happened eight years ago, but I talk to him all the time.
…I’m sorry about what happened to your dad.
You don’t have to do that.
Do what?
Pretend.
I don’t want pity.
Tangeau, he’s not like that.

Uncle.  
Be.
Careful.

Please.
I’m begging you.
I…I will be.
So long as you are…I can’t…
You won’t.
I love you, favorite nephew.

I love you, Uncle.
Be safe.

Sorry about that. He’s a great kid.
I mean that.
He’s just a kid who lost his dad too soon.
Oh, shoot man, how recently?
Two years ago.
Still taking it hard, huh.
it’s complicated…

Wait, Tangeau’s your nephew, right?
So, was it your brother who passed?

Yeah…Bongeau. 
Best man I ever knew. Best man I’ll ever know.
I’m sorry, man, that’s hard. Older or younger?

Older!
The best older brother, mentor, father, teacher figure a guy could ask for.
You really love him, don’t you.
With all my heart.
As does Tangeau, and that’s why he’s so angry.
Don’t hold it against him—he’s such a good kid.
Plus, angry people don’t phase me anymore.
Tough guy!

Not at all, [i]haha.
Look at the arm difference between us!
Which is nothing compared to your potential!
[i]Haha![/i] But it isn’t even me—it’s my Gramma.
Your Grandma’s picking fights???
No, no, but she was just very protective of me.
So, I’ve seen a lot of yelling, a lot of anger directed at other people.
And it was great, until one day it was pointed at me.
Scary, huh?
Yeah, but it was deserved, cuz I was goofing off or something stupid.
So, if Tangeau is mad, he must really care about you.
I mean, he should treat you with respect, cuz you’re his elder and his Uncle.
And, you know…he loves you? And you’re kind to people you love.
But don’t worry about how he treats me. I’m not offended by him in the slightest.
Hah, well, in many ways Tangeau is almost an elder to me…
But I know he cares. I’m a very lucky uncle!

And I know he’s scared…but, that part…I don’t know how to help.
Bongeau would know. Bongeau knew exactly what to do to help Tangeau.

He knew when to be gentle, when to be firm.
He knew how to handle anything life threw at any of us.
But I’m over here…and I’m just a mess.
Nah, man, I mean, it’s not just him dealing with his dad’s death.
You’re also dealing with the death of your brother.
You both care about Bongeau, and you both care about each other.
You both got this.
Thanks, Orven. You’re a good friend.
Careful saying that around Tangeau! We just met, after all.
[i]Haha![/i] Can’t help it if it’s true.
Don’t worry, things like that don’t get under my skin.
Thanks, he really doesn’t mean it.
I know. I used to be that upset.
You???
Yeah! I had a little mean streak.
[i]Haha[/i], you got into fights?
No, no, I couldn’t physically do that.
I’m telling you, with some protein and determination, you can take on anyone!

Well, not when I was a kid, and that’s why I was so upset all the time.
I was thinking things like,
“Why me?”

“This isn’t fair!” 
“I hate my life.”
Just really upset about what my life was, and what I thought my life was going to be.
And I might not have been [i]rude[/i] like how your nephew is rude.

But, all of those words were just stewing inside of me.
I didn't [i]say[/i] them, but I definitely thought them.

So, I get it. Don’t worry, I trust you when you say he’s a good guy.
It’s just a tough time to be in.
But thankfully, with time and with you, it’ll get better.
I sure hope so.

You know, if I could hang Tangeau’s portrait on the wall, I would.
Seeing them both together, smiling.
Nothing better.
I’m sure he’d hate that, though.
[i]Haha![/i] Despise it!

You’re a sweet guy, Rondeau.
I hope Tangeau’s not too mad at us talking.

Tangeau will be fine!
If you keep showing up, he’ll have to like you!
[i]Haha[/i], I’d like that.
Boss.
[i]AHH!
Perfect timing as always!
Talking for extended periods of time to someone who is not going to buy food is not conducive to our business.
I’ll pay! I’ll pay!

Not you.
Angry face.
I told you, Blight: Tangeau is basically the co-owner!
Or like, my boss?
Boss[font=res://addons/dialogic/Example Assets/Fonts/DefaultFontSmall.tres][superscript]2[/superscript].

Your nephew’s your boss, Rondeau?
That’s messed up.
Kinda?
It’s complicated.
But, I’m the owner of All Bread Patisseries!
And I am the one who will take your order.

events.question: Please choose from the menu the item that you wish to put in your mouth.

events.text: [color=#ffed29](Slop and flop?)
I gotta go with the one that will make me pig out.
I have prepared the extra napkins necessary to eat this.
Enjoy the meat that has been ground and then obscured by tomato sauce and spices.
Where’s the bread?

Underneath the slop.
The flop will happen when you try to retrieve the moist bread.

[i]Eugh[/i], appetizing.
[color=#ffed29](Lets see what an actual meal tastes like?)

[color=#ffed29](Oh, this one is like what I expected.)
Wait, this one is normal.
I have always been normal.
NO, like this meal is normal.

I get all of it. It’s garlic, some hot sauce, brown sugar, tomato sauce, salt, pepper.  
Onion, ground beef, and bread.

A THIEF.
COMPROMISING OUR RECIPES.
NO! No! I can just taste all these things, I don’t mean to steal any secrets.

But, I can’t do that AT ALL with "Spicy Bread."
What’s the secret??? What’s the recipe???
Secrets are, by their nature, unknown to most people.
But, not between friends?
Friendship has not been declared between us.
Come on, Blight! Why is "Spicy Bread" weird???

Nothing about this establishment is out of the ordinary.
Please suppress any feelings that say otherwise.
I’ll find out what’s going on with "Spicy Bread"!!!
Never.
Enjoy your meal.
I will continue to enjoy your futile efforts.

events.choice: Bread of the Day (see Market Price)

events.text: What do you mean by “Bread of the Day,” and what is the “market price"?
Today’s bread of the day is a buttered scone with an apricot jam and hints of ginger.
Whoa, you guys really stepped up your game.
No, it is the “Bread of the Day,” so it is purchased from local sources.

??????
So you’re saying that you bought this from, “local sources?”
Those were the words I said.
You mean, like, from [b]another bakery[/b]???

We purchase our “Bread of the Day” goods from Liz’s Bluebird Bakery.
The market prices are whatever she priced her bread at, nothing more and nothing less.
Is this legal???
Yes. We have been given permission.

She taught me everything I know about baking!
She’s great.
I should go to [i]her[/i] bakery!
Yes. She produces better baked goods than us.
And she’s very sweet—I would highly recommend her bakery.
I’m excited to try her stuff???

WOW. This is incredible.
Scones are usually so dry, but the dough is rich and crumbly without the dryness.
And the ginger and apricot are an AMAZING combination.
She’s the best!
Liz, right?
Yup! Liz Aocello, and her bakery is Liz’s Bluebird Bakery.
Dang, thanks for the recommendation, guys.
Yes, but continue to return to ABP.
Yeah, you can’t get this service at Liz’s!

Yeah, I guess so?
She doesn’t get bread from you guys?

Oh, no way.
Her stuff is better.
Our items are not fit to be on her menu.
Thanks for the recommendation, but if it’s really that good, I might not come back!
Spicy Bread will always bring you back.
Don’t get me started!
I’ll take the Green Green Garlic Bread?
So good you gotta say it twice?
So green you say it twice.
This bread is structurally sound.
Duly noted that the baseline is structurally [i]unsound[/i] bread.
I bake the bread in the way that has been instructed to me.
Oh! It’s a pretty good pesto.
Honestly, not a bad idea to merge it with garlic bread, I like that.
You act as if your input will make an impact on the menu items.

Ah, sorry! [i]Haha[/i], a bad habit of mine.
I just really like food.
Why?

"Why"?
Why wouldn’t you like food?
I have no opinions towards food.

Haven’t you tasted something that just makes your day?
Something so complex and so enriching that it just makes you feel good?
No.
Or...haven’t you eaten something and thought, “wow, if I could taste love, it would be this"?
No.

Love is a concept.
You cannot taste concepts.

Or…haven’t you been surprised by something you ate?
Just like, “Oh, I never thought of this combination or taste before!"
Every time I eat.

Isn’t that intriguing???
Doesn’t it make you curious???
That’s why I’m so hung up on "Spicy Bread"!
People are intriguing. They make me curious.

Why do they enjoy sustenance so much?
How have they turned function into pleasure?
Why is something that can be done efficiently and in solitude often done socially?

We all gotta eat!
No matter who you are, or where you come from.
We all gotta eat.
Intriguing.
Intriguing enough to let me know what’s wrong with "Spicy Bread"?
In no way.
Enjoy your meal.
You know I’m going to have [rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8][wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]“The Special!”
The stubborn choice.
I’m telling you, I’m going to get to the bottom of this if it’s the last thing I do.
Ultimately, a meaningless practice.
No! I gotta know!
And if you were to obtain this knowledge, what would this accomplish?
Peace!!! Victory!!!

This peace must be obtained through resignation.
"Spicy Bread" is always victorious.
I will beat it!!
A doomed ending you have selected for yourself.

events.question: Please now select from the designated list of spices to put on your bread. The selections change daily to promote returning customers.

events.text:
Black pepper.
Familiar, a taste I know all too well.
You are a fan.

I know what it’s going to taste like.
And you’re not even adding olive oil or butter.
So, I KNOW it’s just gonna be some peppery bread.
As advertised.
It can’t be surprising, it won't be surprising!

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
I’m going white pepper. So potent, so pungent.

You’re not going to mask this one.
I expect a bite of white pepper on bread and it’s going to taste exactly as expected.
We do not intend to mask one of the two ingredients on this dish.
That would be wasteful.
Exactly! So, let me taste the weird white pepper bread!

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Red pepper flakes are a staple in my household.
Please do not use this product to support your living quarters.
It will be! Because I’m going to understand this fully this time.
It will be my foundation because of how solid my understanding will be of "Spicy Bread."
Unwise, please consult a contractor.
I know nothing about housing…this was all a metaphor.
I’m a newly hired eighteen-year-old who will probably pay rent for the rest of his life.
Why would you pay someone else for the place you live in?
I don’t actually [i]own[/i] the land or the building.

You live in that space.
It is yours.
I know, society, right?
Always irrational, ever intriguing.
Just like "Spicy Bread."

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Is this a spice???
It is a slightly aromatic vegetable substance used to flavor food.

Okay, I’m choosing this one!
Because I know it’s going to be dry green bell pepper on bread!
And I know what that tastes like. And it’s not great.
No one has been dissatisfied by “Spicy Bread".
Give it here, it can’t be good.

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
As expected.
Nooo! It can’t be!!!
I knew it, too! I was expecting it!
WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO THIS BREAD???
Nothing unethical.
Why would you be doing something unethical to this bread???
I am not, which is why I said I was not.

I WILL understand.
I WILL crack this recipe!
There is no future where this will be true.
Oh, there is. I can’t be a Zanry and let this go by.

Even if I have to drag Gramma all the way here just to try your bread, I will.
And when she cracks it, you’ll be toast.

We do not toast "Spicy Bread".
Please enjoy your untoasted meal.
RONDEAU!!!
ORVEN?
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]TELL ME THE SECRET TO “SPICY BREAD!”
Your other foods aren’t weird, so what gives with "Spicy Bread"???
I mean, it’s exactly as advertised: bread and a spice of your choosing!

Bro, seriously.
It doesn’t taste like just bread and a spice, you can’t tell me that it does.
I think of it as…the minimalism of bread.
That’s not how taste works!!!
What’s the secret ingredient???
Love?
NO!!!
No.
Blight, come on, we talked about this!
And I have made clear that my position will never be compromised.
wild stallions couldn’t drag you away?
Oh! You’ve met Throck?
Yeah, that guy loves horses.
More than anyone I know!
Horses…
Oh, the “muscular hoofed quadruped mammal with a long face.”
Ah, yes.
Throck and Babs are fun guys.

Really smart…
Do you get the magic stuff they’re talking about?
Nope!
I get the horse stuff they talk about, though.
The more confusing of the two options.
You just gotta go up to one, I swear it won’t kick you.
Their musculature says otherwise.
Untrue! They don’t hit me!
They see that if they were to hit you, they would injure themselves.
They would shatter me.
I’m with Blight on this one—animals you just gotta give space.
I gotta bring you both to a zoo one day.
Extremely enticing.
[i]Haha[/i], I love zoos!

So does Tangeau!
You should see him at the petting zoo.
Touching animals is permitted?
Some! Others, definitely no.
Are horses in the petting zoo?
Small ones!
You can shrink animals?

No! Not like that.
They’re just…born small?
Isn’t selective breeding, like, a really long-term form of shrinking animals?
I guess?
I guess we can shrink animals after many generations.
Highly inefficient.
Oh shoot, it’s getting late.
I hate staying close to closing hours for shops and stuff.

This store is open until 9PM, and until 9PM people are permitted to stay.
There is no time when this is more permitted or less permitted.

Yeah, make yourself at home!
Don’t worry about us.
[i]Haha[/i], I feel like I already have.
You will not need to pay rent to stay during hours of operation here.
[color=#ffed29](I’d hope so??)
Good!
But I should head out.
I don’t want to have you have to carry me home again.
I enjoyed it!
Me too, [i]haha.
But, I gotta use these legs or else I might lose them!
How can you lose something attached to your person?
You can lose anything.
This is true for you.
Come back anytime, friend!
Come back and purchase more items on the menu.

I will!
Goodnight!
